alert.note: Alert for Coastal Duval; Coastal St. Johns; South Central Duval (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Jacksonville (Northeast Florida and Southeast Georgia)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued April 22 at 5:59PM EDT by NWS Jacksonville
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northern St. Johns and southeastern Duval Counties through 630 PM EDT... At 559 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over San Marco, or near Jacksonville, moving east at 20 mph. HAZARD...Winds around 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Jacksonville, Unf, Ponte Vedra Beach, Arlington, Jacksonville Beach, Atlantic Beach, Neptune Beach, Baymeadows, Mayport and Ortega. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Coastal Duval; Coastal St. Johns; South Central Duval
